name: Top Down Shooter (ManiacCoder)
description:
You might have already guessed that this is a top down shooter. but knowing that could fool you. to a lot of people this game could be somewhat CHALLENGING! there are 3 types of enemies

The red ones are the normal enemies. they have average health and walk like a average HUMAN.

The green ones are as fast as you! but have less health, but make sure to watch your back cause they can come up behind you.

and finally, the BLUE ones are brutes. they have tons of health, but sadly are slower than average speed.

That is all the opponents in the game. but you probably need to know how to PLAY

Hold down the left mouse button to shoot.

W A S D to move.

and press enter to start!

Now that you know everything about the game, GO AND KICK SOME BUTT!
